General.Name: DL Construction Co
General.Description: DL Construction Co., Ltd. operates as a construction company in South Korea. The company constructs office buildings, hotels, hospitals, leisure facilities, education facilities, factories, logistics facilities, and sales facilities; apartments, villas, and residential complexes; and ports, golf courses, public playgrounds, industrial complexes, oil tanks, roads, complexes, subways, bridges, tunnels, power stations, and environment/harbour areas. It also engages in the reconstruction and redevelopment; and landscaping businesses. The company was founded in 1956 and is headquartered in Incheon, South Korea. DL Construction Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of DL Holdings CO., LTD.

1.Name: Young-Bok  Shim
1.Title: Sr. Managing Director and Director of Civil Engineering Division, Order & Sales Team
